          <title>
            <string language="en">Temperature measurement of melting of ice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperaturmessen des Schmelzens des Eises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de la température de la fonte de la glace</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the setup for determining the temperature of ice as it melts.</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation pour

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a instalação para

          </description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την οργάνωση για τον
